name: Entwined (itch) (Lazertrax)
description:
MADE in 48 hours for the GM48 - 35 Game Jam!

Entwined is a cute puzzle game about two cute lovers who help each other across 18 levels of flipping colors!

DISCLAIMER: 

This is a post jam version with a couple of bug-fixes to solve the issue of not being able to progress beyond level 16.

You can check out the original Jam version and possibly rate it by clicking here.

CONTROLS:

  • WASD or Arrows to Move
  • Space to Switch Characters 
  • R to Restart 
  • Escape to Exit

CREDITS:

  • Lazertrax - Code/Design/Graphics

Hope you enjoy playing!
